content: निदानं {@--1@} A band, rope, halter. {@--2@} A rope for tying up a calf. {@--3@} A primary cause, the first or essential cause; निदिनमिक्ष्वाकुकुलस्य संततेः <ls>R. 3. 1</ls>; अथवा बलमारंभो निदानं क्षयसंपदः <ls>Śi. 2. 94.</ls> {@--4@} A cause in general; मुंच मयि मानमनिदानं <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--5@} (In medicine) Inquiry into the causes of a disease, pathology. {@--6@} Diagnosis of a disease. {@--7@} End, termination. {@--8@} Purity, purification, correctness. {@--9@} Claiming the reward of penitential acts.
